t: SAKS FIFTH AVENUE JUST ARRIVED ON AMAZON
s: 3 weeks ago - Amazon has a lot of products to sort through — trust us, we know. Fortunately, an unlikely collaboration has made it easy to find and get your hands on some of your favorite luxury brands. Saks Fifth Avenue has teamed up with Amazon for a curated selection of luxe pieces now available on Amazon.

t: AMAZON AND SAKS FIFTH AVENUE LAUNCH LUXURY E-COMMERCE STOREFRONT | RETAIL DIVE
s: 3 weeks ago - The new shopping section is called Luxury Stores at Amazon. It features a selection of merchandise curated by Saks Fifth Avenue, including women’s and men’s ready-to-wear, beauty, shoes, handbags and accessories. Merchandise is available through Amazon’s app and website.

t: SAKS OPENS ON AMAZON: BOLD MOVE OR DESPERATE MEASURE?

t: HIGH-END DEPARTMENT STORE RETAILER SAKS LAUNCHES AMAZON STOREFRONT | REUTERS
s: 3 weeks ago - LOS ANGELES, April 29 (Reuters) - Saks Fifth Avenue is launching a storefront on Amazon.com (AMZN.O), opens new tab where it will sell high-end, designer products from Dolce&Gabbana and Balmain in the e-commerce giant's latest foray into selling luxury goods, the companies said on Tuesday.
